mapper.select: SELECT ID, USERNAME, substring(PASSWORD,7) PASSWORD, CASE ENABLED WHEN 1 THEN 'Enable' WHEN 0 THEN 'Disable' END STATUS, MAIL FROM USERS where 1=1 and ID = #{ID} and USERNAME like concat('%',#{Name},'%') and PASSWORD like concat('%',#{Password},'%') and ENABLED = #{Status} and MAIL like concat('%',#{Mail},'%') ;
mapper.update: update users set username = #{Name}, Password = #{PW}, Mail = #{Mail}, enabled = #{Status}, ID = #{ID} where 1=1 and ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) + 1 < 10 THEN CONCAT(#{Category}, '_00', COUNT(1) + 1) WHEN COUNT(1) + 1 < 100 THEN CONCAT(#{Category}, '_0', COUNT(1) + 1) WHEN COUNT(1) + 1 >= 100 THEN CONCAT(#{Category}, '_', COUNT(1) + 1) END name FROM product WHERE 1=1 and Category = #{Category} ;
mapper.insert: insert into product ( CATEGORY, NAME, Cost, num, ONSALE , src ) values ( #{Category}, #{Name_P}, #{Cost}, #{num}, #{onsale}, #{src} )
mapper.update: update product set CATEGORY = #{Category}, NAME = #{Name_P}, Cost = #{Cost}, num = #{num}, ONSALE = #{onsale}, src = #{src}, ID = #{ID_P} where 1=1 and ID = #{ID_P}
mapper.select: select a.PKNO, a.NO, DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE(a.NO, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) DT, a.UserId, a.username, a.pId, a.pname, a.num, a.price amount, a.onsale_mk, a.status, b.value value from records a inner join status b on a.status = b.key and b.name = 'record_status' where 1 = 1 and NO = #{NO} and NO >= #{Date_Time_S} and NO <= #{Date_Time_E} and price = #{amount} and status = #{status} order by pkno desc;
